President Trump , at a White House discussion on immigration Wednesday , referred to MS-13 gang members as " animals , " although [ARG0: some media outlets] [V: took] [ARG1: the remark] [ARGM-MNR: out of context] , [ARGM-PRD: suggesting that he was referring to all illegal immigrants] .
